org.wildfly.swarm.config.logging.logging_profile

Class FileHandler<T extends FileHandler<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.config.logging.logging_profile.FileHandler<T>

  • public class FileHandler<T extends FileHandler<T>>
extends Object
    Defines a handler which writes to a file.
